explains: n. 缓刑（期）；试用期，见习期；察看（期），考察（期）
wordGroup: on probation 服缓刑；作为试用
probation period 试用期；见习期
probation officer 试用官；缓刑犯监督官

sentences.en: He was given two years' probation.
The prisoner was put on probation.
She was found guilty of manslaughter and put on probation for two years.
sentences.cn: 她被判过失杀人罪，缓刑两年。
